ui.interviewQuestion1: Hello, let's talk about algorithm problems today. Please implement a function that, given an integer array and a target value, returns the indices of two numbers in the array such that they add up to the target value. How would you solve this problem?
ui.interviewAnswer1: This is the classic Two Sum problem. I can use a hash table to solve it with O(n) time complexity...
ui.interviewQuestion2: Great approach! Can you tell me why you chose a hash table over a brute force solution? Could you elaborate on the time complexity analysis?
ui.interviewAnswer2: The brute force approach requires two nested loops with O(n¬≤) time complexity. A hash table allows O(1) lookup time...
ui.codeToolboxTitle: # AI Code Toolbox - Smart Programming Examples
ui.optimizeTodo: # TODO: Try to optimize this recursive algorithm
ui.optimizeHint: # Hint: Dynamic programming can improve performance
ui.problemDescription1: # Given an integer array nums and a target value
ui.problemDescription2: # Find two integers that add up to target and return their indices
ui.solutionComment: Using hash table to solve Two Sum problem
ui.createHashComment: num_map = {}  # Create hash table to store values and indices
ui.complementComment: complement = target - num  # Calculate required complement
ui.storeNumberComment: num_map[num] = i  # Store current number in hash table
